segments.text: May I ask what the name is the girl ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is Miao Li . She's come here to see her brother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's so . She looks very lovely . Could you give me some else information on her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . She's a costume designer and works in a garment mill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you think about her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She looks very beautiful . She is a nice girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm wondering if she has boyfriend .
segments.speaker: S1
